title: Women's Ministry
mission: Our Mission is to Know-christ and make him known" Women ministry is an aim of offering women oppurtunities to grow in their faith and build friendship with women to worship our LORD and serve one another in love we give You a place of service as well as a place to grow in faith.
description: The fact that your a woman does not make you a different kind of christian but the fact that you are a christian makes you a different kind of women.

title: Youth Ministry
description: In this day and age when the world offers so much to entice an mislead the young people, our Creator's clarion call rings clear.

title: Childrens Ministry
description: We are passionate about helping your children know Jesus Christ as their Savior and teach them to love our loving and living God.
